metadata.title: CVE-2023-31085 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/mtd/ubi/cdev.c in the Linux kernel 6.2.There is a divide-by-zero error in do_div(sz,mtd->erasesize), usedindirectly by ctrl_cdev_ioctl, when mtd->erasesize is 0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-248-generic - 4.4.0-248.282
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-248-generic - 4.4.0-248.282
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-248-lowlatency - 4.4.0-248.282
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
